ygData.subject: Cast Force
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m on the Karana server and I m having a very hard time find these two runes Rune of Presence and Rune of Disassociation. I need those two runes to make
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm on the Karana server and I'm having a very hard time find these two
runes
Rune of Presence and Rune of Disassociation. I need those two runes to make
the spell Cast Force. I was able to find one rune in the dwarf city someone
sold it to a store keep it seems. But I could'nt find the other finally a
friend bought one from a guy in unrest. I tried to combine the spells and I
failed. So if someone out there can help me get these runes and perhaps tell
me what level you need to be to combine I would be most happy. I know of
another wizard that tried it at a skill level of 30 and failed also. At this
point I'm kinda looking to buy the spell from someone if they can make it
for me. Thanks for your time.
